author: Staff Reporter
text:
Republic Day celebrations began at the Coimbatore Corporation on Tuesday with Mayor P. Rajkumar hoisting the National Flag in the presence of officials and councillors at the main office in Town Hall.

Mr. Rajkumar garlanded a bust of Mahatma Gandhi and also gave away Rs. 2,000 as prize and certificates to 38 employees who had had 25 years of blemish-less service.

Appointment orders

He also gave away appointment orders to 10 doctors, 17 nurses and a few paramedical staff.

Students from the Corporation’s schools on Oppanakara Street, in Selvapuram and R.S. Puram treated the gathering to cultural performances that brought out patriotic fervour. Students who were specially trained in kalari and dance also showcased their skills. The girl students played band.

Commissioner K. Vijayakarthikeyan, Deputy Mayor Leelavathi Unni, Deputy Commissioner P. Gandhimathi and other officials were also present.
title: Republic Day celebrated at Corporation
